attributes.action: Set up a national database of recorded symptoms of viruses that are presently affecting individuals across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An online database that records observed and experienced symptoms of different viruses that are affecting the different areas of the UK so that healthcare professionals and individuals could check their symptoms with those recorded by others in their local area.  This could help reduce waiting times at local doctor's surgeries and speed up diagnosis!!! (Input by members of public and health professionals)
